Name: Hello Charlotte EP2: Requiem Aeternam Deo
About the game: Intro Hello, new Puppeteer! Meet Charlotte — a Puppet you will control. Meet her alien friends, maggot cat and a certain Observer. Dive deep into horrors of junk food, TV world, religion and romance novels for middle-aged women. Keep your puppet safe at all times. Or don't. Have fun dying! Description Hello Charlotte is an episodic game, where each episode can be considered a separate story, as they differ in storytelling style, themes and illustrations, but the characters stay the same. This story, Hello Charlotte: Requiem Aeternam Deo , is the second installment of the Hello Charlotte series. Hello Charlotte, Episode 1: Junk Food, Gods and Teddy Bears can be downloaded for free on itch.io. Hello Charlotte games: Hello Charlotte EP1 (2015) is a story about a memory of long-gone gods and loss of individuality, where your Puppet's new friend goes missing among the static. It is available for free download as a demo and on itch.io: -charlotte-ep1 . Hello Charlotte EP2 (2016) is a story lamenting the impossibility of universal happiness, and idolization of those out of our reach. As her mind unravels, ink will flow, and blood-red flowers will bloom in the desolate field. Hello Charlotte: Delirium (2017) is a spin-off minigame made to test some of the RPG Maker features. It's a red herring. Hello Charlotte EP3 (2018) is the final story in the series, serving as a prologue and an epilogue to the main plot. A prosumer noise machine, a virulent insect, an obscene revelation — and an earnest thank you.
